channel.title: Need some help here from someone from the rs-server dev team
channel.description: Everyone hates the dreaded "failed to find connection vertex" errors. However, they are a special problem to me, because they crash my server. Completely. I have studied them a bit and the fatal ones only occur to a client with a playerID of 0. Any freaking idea why this happens? Has anyone figured out a better way of handling walking? This is the one thing left messin up my server. Thanks.

item.title: Need some help here from someone from the rs-server dev team
item.dc:creator: @yppman yppman
item.description:
@yppman wrote:

Everyone hates the dreaded “failed to find connection vertex” errors. However, they are a special problem to me, because they crash my server. Completely. I have studied them a bit and the fatal ones only occur to a client with a playerID of 0. Any freaking idea why this happens? Has anyone figured out a better way of handling walking? This is the one thing left messin up my server. Thanks.
